#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#include <string.h>

int main(){
    int cases;
    char a[30];
    char b[30];
    int ta =0;
    int tb= 0;
    int out, inn, ctr,p;
    char temp;
    cin>> cases;
    char op[cases];
    p = cases;
    int z = 0;
    while (cases-- > 0){
        cin>> a >> b;
        ctr = 0;
        ta = strlen(a);
        tb = strlen(b);

        if (ta ==  tb){
            for (out = 0 ;out <strlen(a) ; out++){
                temp = a[out];
                for (inn = 0 ; inn < strlen(b); inn++){
                    if (temp == b[inn]){
                        ctr++;
                        b[inn] = '.';
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
        if (ctr == ta){
            op[z++] = 'Y';
            }
        else {
            op[z++] = 'N';
            }
        }
    else{
        op[z++]= 'N';
        continue;
        }

  }
for (int m =0;m<p;m++){
        if ((op[m] == 'Y') and (m != p-1)){cout<<"YES"<<endl;}
        else if (((op[m] == 'N') and (m != p-1))){cout<<"NO"<<endl;}
        else if (((op[m] == 'Y') and (m = p-1))){cout<<"YES";}
        else if (((op[m] == 'N') and (m = p-1))){cout<<"NO";}
        //cout<<endl;
}

return 0;
}
